data.eml:eml: The millipede genus Tetracentrosternus Pocock, 1895 (Polydesmida, Paradoxosomatidae, Alogolykinae, Alogolykini), with a description of the first, new species from Thailand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Likhitrakarn, Natdanai, Golovatch, Sergei I., Panha, Somsak (2013): The millipede genus Tetracentrosternus Pocock, 1895 (Polydesmida, Paradoxosomatidae, Alogolykinae, Alogolykini), with a description of the first, new species from Thailand. ZooKeys 358: 1-10, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.358.6582, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.358.6582
